inline \(x\)

equation

\[\begin{equation} x\label{eq:0} \end{equation}\]

align

\[\begin{align} &ax+b \label{eq:1} \\ &cx+d \label{eq:2} \end{align}\]

The equations \eqref{eq:0}, \eqref{eq:1} and \eqref{eq:2}.

\[\begin{equation} A=\begin{pmatrix} a&b\\ c&d \end{pmatrix} \, . \end{equation}\]
